title: Hawthorne Village- Fall opening
posting_body: ['A hidden historic gem!', 'The actual site of the Village is where mill hands grew their gardens and raised their children.', 'Located off Main Street (Route 62) just minutes from West Concord Center, commuter rail, library, shopping, eateries, playground and so much more.', ' This spacious multi-level two bedroom one and a half bath townhouse offers ample closet space throughout.', 'As you enter your private entrance into the tiled foyer this cheerful townhouse will instantly warm your heart.', 'The bright eat-in-kitchen is fully equipped with an electric range, built-in microwave, Estar Rated refrigerator, dishwasher, and garbage disposal.', 'An 8 ft. sliding door opens onto your private patio which helps bring the outdoors in.', 'As you proceed up the vaulted stairway, the multi closeted hallway leads to the master bedroom with a double closet and access to walk-through full bathroom with tub.', 'The second bedroom is also a generous sized room with another closet!', 'Your full finished lower level, makes for a great family room or office.', 'Enclosed laundry room with washer/dryer connections.', 'Energy efficient gas furnace, hot water heater and central air conditioning system.', 'Ample parking steps from your own private entrance.', 'Water, sewer, trash, landscaping, and snow removal included in the rent.', 'Easy walk to charming West Concord shops, eateries and commuter rail to Boston.', 'Located in picturesque and historic Concord.', 'Easy commute - minutes to Rt. 2, Rt. 128 and Rt. 495.', 'Nearby towns: Lexington, Acton, Bedford, Lincoln, Sudbury, Wayland, Waltham, Westford.', 'Lease terms:', '$2,600 per month for a minimum of a 12-month lease.', '$3,000 per month for a minimum of a 9-month lease.', 'No pets.', 'No smoking.', 'Qualification Standards:', 'Good credit & clean criminal background.', 'Minimum net income: $94,546 per year on a 12-month lease (not applicable for section 8 applicants).', 'Good references.', 'This apartment is presently occupied.', 'Therefore, we are not showing it at this time.', 'All interested parties must email their full name, names of all other occupants, and phone number for more information on the first available day of showing.', '*Pictures and floor plan are of a sample unit and should be used as an example only*']
